snippet: The rising star Lucien Smith evokes Giuliani-era New York—so recent, and yet, so long ago—with a new exhibition and a film made with Glenn O’Brien.
abstract: The rising star Lucien Smith evokes Giuliani-era New York—so recent, and yet, so long ago—with a new exhibition and a film made with Glenn O’Brien.

headline.main: On View | A Wunderkind Artist Summons a Barely Bygone New York
